Articles.Content:
So this mission/challenge is to land on the Mun or Minmus whatever pleases you. Instead of a reentry wherever you enter at one of the poles. For extra challenge no parachute.

IF YOU ARE TAKING IT AS A CHALLENGE HERE ARE THE GUIDELINES

1 Rocket (Crew size 6)

At most 30 Kerbal Days

All crew must be able to EVA when you return

Proof

OPTIONAL

On KerbalX

Entire crew lands on the Mun

You are able to 100% reuse the craft

Have Fun
